value:
Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Ashnard:
Mad King with Sharena: Princess of Askr on
your team.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Ashnard:
Mad King on Lunatic or higher difficulty with
Ashnard: Mad King on your team.

Defeat Ashnard: Mad King at level 40 or
higher with Sharena: Princess of Askr.

Defeat Ashnard: Mad King at level 40 or
higher with Ashnard: Mad King.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Ashnard:
Mad King on Lunatic or higher using an
all-cavalry team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Forsyth
& Python with Anna: Commander on your team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Forsyth
& Python on Lunatic or higher with Alfonse:
Prince of Askr on your team.

Defeat Forsyth: Loyal Lieutenant at level 40 or
higher with Anna: Commander.

Defeat Python: Apathetic Archer at level 40 or
higher with Alfonse: Prince of Askr.

Win the Bound Hero Battle against Forsyth
& Python on Lunatic or higher using an
all-flying team.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Paralogue 57: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 57: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 57: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Myrrh and Nah journey to the spring festival,
where they deepen their ties as manaketes.
They appear in Fire Emblem: The Sacred
Stones / Awakening.

Eldest princess of Macedon. She is donning
seasonal garb while attending the spring
festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery
of the Emblem.

Olivia's son. Conquering his shyness, he makes
his entry to the spring festival. Appears in
Fire Emblem Awakening.

Cordelia's daughter. Came to participate in the
spring festival. Kind to her friends, but has a bit
of a chip on her shoulder. Appears in Fire
Emblem Awakening.

Sage of Caer Pelyn, come to celebrate in the
spring festival. Also Ewan's teacher. Appears
in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the
Harmonized button. This skill can be used only
once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be
used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Resonance Effect: Sacred Stones /
Awakening
Increases scores in Resonant Battles.
(More details can be found in the Help
messages within Resonant Battles.)

Beats back enemies with high defense
and counterattack ability! Bows are
no threat with their Harmonized skill!

Can get a bonus to Atk and effectively
Spd+9—plus offers the combination
of a green bow on a flying unit!

Can get up to 4 attacks and trigger
her Special twice! Has a skill to raise
stats and score higher in the Arena.

Can get Atk+17 under the right
conditions! And on top of that, she
can neutralize penalties to Atk/Spd.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit
and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd
during combat.

Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit
and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd
during combat.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants
Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat, and also, if
unit initiates combat and unit or an ally has
already entered combat during the same
phase, unit attacks twice.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to
unit during combat and reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by 40%. If foe's Range = 2, calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

$aGrants【Resonance: Blades】and the following
effect to unit and allies from the same titles
as unit for 1 turn: "Foe cannot make a
follow-up attack."

Grants the following effect to unit for 1 turn:
"Neutralizes 'effective against flying' bonuses."

【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.
